english.segment1: I saw the stars were falling down. And the moon was bleeding red. Is this the end?. Maranatha!. Our Lord comes! Are you shaking now?. Maranatha!. Our Lord comes! Are you nervous?. And time has run out. And time is gone. Welcome to your separation. Welcome to, salvation!. Maranatha!. Our Lord comes! Are you nervous now?. Maranatha!. Our Lord comes! Are you shaking?. HEY CHRISTIAN!!! You're sleeping!. I will try to..(Your sleeping). Why can't I.. (Wake up). I will try to.. (Your sleeping). Why can't I.. (Wake up). Your will be done in my life.. Your will be done in my life.. Maranatha! Maranatha! Maranatha!. Our Lord comes! Our Lord comes! Our Lord comes!
